ygData.subject: Re: Kunark Expansion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What on the test server of significance (i.e. something that would mean a change to gameplay, dot nerf, etc, something where verant says specifically that
ygData.messageBody:
>I agree and understand. But GZ flat out stated that
>the information in SPDAT.EFF was on test for
>_testing_ and even made the 'joke spells' at the end
>to prove his point.

What on the test server of significance (i.e.
something that would mean a change to gameplay, dot
nerf, etc, something where verant says specifically
that test is only for test) has NOT made it to
production? Test server is not for testing, at least
its not used as such. I know of several instances
where a test server player has been given something to
test, item, etc and reported a bug directly to the
developer only to see it not fixed. (High elfs coded
on the ranger only sword instead of half elfs for
example.)
